ReadWriteDao<I extends WithID> - Class in database
Base class of DAOs that provide read and write access to a class of items in the database.
ReadWriteDao(Connection, User, String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class database.ReadWriteDao
Constructs a DAO providing read/write access to a table containing a class of items.
refresh() - Method in class controller.AppointmentsController
Loads the appointments table from the database, applying the appropriate filter.
refresh() - Method in class controller.CustomersController
Loads the customers table from the database.
refresh() - Method in class controller.ReportsController
Refreshes the current report from the database.
refresh() - Method in interface support.Refreshable
Asks the receiver to refresh its data from the database.
refreshable - Variable in class controller.AppointmentController
Reference to the object needing to be refreshed afterward
refreshable - Variable in class controller.CustomerController
Reference to the object needing to be refreshed afterward
Refreshable - Interface in support
Interface for controllers that provide views of the database that may go stale due to activity outside the application.
refreshButton - Variable in class controller.ReportsController
Control for the refresh button, which may need to be disabled.
Report<I> - Class in reports
Base class for reports shown on the reports tab of the main window.

reportDbError(DatabaseException) - Method in class controller.Controller
Utility for generically reporting unexpected database errors.
reports - package reports
 
ReportsController - Class in controller
Manages the reports tab on the main window, providing a drop-down menu for selecting the desired report, as well as a refresh button for updating the report to reflect the activity of other users.
ReportsController() - Constructor for class controller.ReportsController
Constructs the controller for the reports tab and shows the scene.
reportsTab - Variable in class controller.MainController
 
reportTabPane - Variable in class controller.ReportsController
The pane for the report tab in which the report table can be placed
reportTypeComboBox - Variable in class controller.ReportsController
Control that selects the report to show

requestSave(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AppointmentController
Handles a user request to write the new or modified appointment to the database, reporting errors instead when the provided data is invalid, including indicating whether the proposed meeting time overlaps with other meeting times for the same customer and thus can't be allowed.
requestSave(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.CustomerController
Handles a user request to write the new or modified customer to the database, reporting errors instead when the provided data is invalid.
